title: Boris Johnson – 2021 Letter of Response to Resignation of Lord Frost
author: admin
summary: The letter sent by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, to Lord Frost, the Minister of State at the Cabinet Office, on 18 December 2021.
content:
[Text of letter [in .pdf format]](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/letter2.pdf)
